metadata.Title: CVE-2022-4254 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description:
sssd: libsss_certmap fails to sanitise certificate data used in LDAP filters

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-4254` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libipa-hbac0 - 2.6.3-1ubuntu3.2
libnss-sss - 2.6.3-1ubuntu3.2
libpam-sss - 2.6.3-1ubuntu3.2
